AI Frontier: Firms that focus on groundbreaking applications of artificial intelligence in enterprise and infrastructure.
Consumer Pioneers: Investors in next-generation consumer products and services with strong branding and user growth.
Hard Tech Builders: Backers of advanced manufacturing, robotics, and deep infrastructure startups.
Bio & Health: VCs investing in biotech, therapeutics, digital health, and life sciences.
Market Makers: Firms building or backing platforms that enable new marketplaces and ecosystem networks.
